options.title: -a
options.description: print a list of builtins showing whether or not each is enabled

options.title: -n
options.description: disable each NAME or display a list of disabled builtins

options.title: -p
options.description: print the list of builtins in a reusable format

options.title: -s
options.description: print only the names of Posix `special' builtins

options.title: -f
options.description: Load builtin NAME from shared object FILENAME
